channel.title: CVE Feed for SDG Technologies -- PnPSCADA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SDG Technologies -- PnPSCADA

item.title: CVE-2024-2882|2024-06-27T18:55:42.276Z -- sdg%20technologies -- pnpscada
item.description: SDG Technologies PnPSCADA allows a remote attacker to attach various entities without requiring system authentication. This breach could potentially lead to unauthorized control, data manipulation, and access to sensitive information within the SCADA system.
